data.title: Ticket Prices and Theatre Features
data.meta_description: We pride ourselves at the Somerville Theatre on our low ticket & concession prices that are less than the other theaters in the Boston area. Learn more about our theatre in Davis Square.
data.text:
We only regularly run around 5 minutes of preview trailers before our feature films â€“ so please plan accordingly.

All of our auditoriums and restrooms are accessible via elevator.

For our regularly scheduled movies, prices are as follows:

Matinees, shows starting before 6pm.

EVERY DAY before 6pm: All seats are $12.00 ($10 for Members)

Evening Admission, shows starting 6pm and after.

General Admission: $16.00 ($14 for Members)

Seniors over 65: $12.00 ($10 for Members)

Silents, Please series: Adults: $17 ($13 for Members), Seniors and Children: $12

70mm Presentations: Adults: $17 ($15 for Members), Seniors and Children: $13

Repertory Double Features: Adults: $18 ($14 for Members)

Repertory Single Features: Adults: $16 ($12 for Members)

Midnight Specials: Adults: $15 ($13 for Members)

We enforce MPAA Ratings, and it is our additional policy that children are not allowed in R rated movies.

We do have assistive listening devices and closed captioning available for most new release movies presented digitally; some classic films or special presentations may not contain this technology.

Please note that ticket prices for live or special events are not set by the theater management and may differ from these rates.

Box Office Hours

Our box office for movie tickets opens approximately 15 minutes before the first show of the day and closes approximately 10 minutes after the last movie of the day has begun.

We accept cash, Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and Amex for movie tickets. We do not accept Amex for live events, concerts, or select special events.
